meaning_str.bing:
v. 提到；写到；说到
n. 提及；说起；写上一笔
网络. 向某人提起某事；谈到；记载

向某人提起某事；谈到；记载

提及；说起；说到；提到；引用；写到；指出；记述；涉及
提及；提到；说起；引述；简要提及；轻微提及；略述；写上一笔

1.en: Public statements from each side made no mention of the currency issue, but a U. S. official said the yuan was discussed.
1.cn: 两国在各自的公开声明中均未提及汇率问题，但一名美国官员说二人在会谈中谈及了此事。

2.en: But mom warned me not to mention all her maltreatment on me to Grandma. Or else she would never let me see Grandma.
2.cn: 妈妈却说你不要跟姥姥说我们对你不好的话，否则就永远也不让你见姥姥。

3.en: He made no mention of disputed presidential elections in Iran in which hard-line president Mahmoud Ahmadinejad was declared the winner.
3.cn: 他并没有提到伊朗有争议的总统选举，伊朗强硬派总统艾哈迈迪内贾德在选举中宣布获胜。

0.en: Dr. Delaney? The judge won't allow any mention of him. Do we think he did it?
0.cn: 德兰尼教授？法官不允许提到他。我们认为是他干的吗？

1.en: And I thank you for convincing the president to mention Celia in his remarks. Well, it was my pleasure.
1.cn: 多谢你说服总统在讲话中提到西莉娅。不客气。

2.en: Although they did mention two heartbeats, but I thought it was just mine and the baby's.
2.cn: 不过确实提到了两种心跳，我当时觉得应该就是我和孩子的吧。

3.en: As you can tell, I am alert, extroverted, affable and articulate. Of course. And not to mention devilishly handsome. Not to mention?
3.cn: 你也能看出，我机敏，外向，亲切，思维清晰，当然了，更不用提如此帅气逼人。真的不是故意提到嘛？

4.en: No, I said you couldn't mention the man himself. Your Honor, it goes to my theory of the case.
4.cn: 不，我是说你不能提到这个人的存在。法官阁下，这涉及到我的辩护理论。

5.en: How come this one's on the back of an eviction notice? Oh, yeah. Now that you mention it, can I live here?
5.cn: 为什么兑换劵是写在一张驱逐令的后面？是啊，既然你刚好提到这事情，我能住在这里吗？

6.en: Of course, I can't mention you in my Nobel acceptance speech, but when I get around to writing my memoirs, you can expect a very effusive footnote and perhaps a signed copy.
6.cn: 但在诺贝尔领奖感言中不能提及你们，不过写传记时，我会在注脚上提到你们或者给你们一本我签名的传记。

7.en: It's funny you should mention diapers. I'm serious.
7.cn: 你现在提起尿布太有趣了。我是认真的。

8.en: Of course, this is impossible, not to mention illegal.
8.cn: 当然，这是不可能的，何况还违法。

9.en: You said I couldn't mention the man's name, Your Honor.
9.cn: 您只说我不能提及他的名字，法官阁下。

10.en: Funny you should mention that. They're buying new clothes.
10.cn: 还真是说对了，他们正在买新衣服。

11.en: Really? I've never heard you mention Adoot. Yeah, sure I have.
11.cn: 真的吗 我从没听你说过阿杜特。我当然说过。

12.en: Why is he in there? What? He forgot to mention? JFK. He killed...?
12.cn: 他为什么关在那里？什么？他忘记说了？刺杀肯尼迪。他杀了他？

13.en: What I forgot to mention is that I'm completely reinventing myself.
13.cn: 我忘了说，我现在要脱胎换骨。

14.en: He's been crying? Oh, I believe that was something else I wasn't supposed to mention.
14.cn: 他哭过？我又漏说了一件不该跟你提起的事。

15.en: Don't mention it! Just loosen up, OK, buddy? Oh, you guys. You really nailed him. Bye.
15.cn: 别客气! 放轻松,好吗,伙计? 啊, 你们这些伙计，你们说到点子上了，再见。

16.en: But, I suggest we don't mention it again. Now, if you'll excuse me, it's time to go down.
16.cn: 但我建议我们不再提起这事，如果你不介意，我该下去了。

17.en: Not to mention, your acting career is going south like Sherman. Read about it in your book.
17.cn: 反正你的演艺事业也如同佘曼将军，一路向南[失败]，翻你的历史课本就懂了。

18.en: Thanks. Don't mention it. Well, it looks like what everybody said about us is true, Patrick.
18.cn: 谢谢。没关系。看起来大家说的是真的，派崔克。

19.en: Yeah, and you know, if you could not mention to them that we live together, that would be great.
19.cn: 对，要是你能不提同居的事，就太好了。
